- Gout must be treated in view of its associated cardiovascular mortality.

- However, hypouricaemia also carries a risk of increased mortality.

question.title: What is the relationship between gout and cardiovascular mortality?

option_a.title: Gout is a risk factor for cardiovascular mortality due to its association with hypertension.

option_b.title: Gout is a risk factor for cardiovascular mortality due to its association with hyperuricemia.

option_c.title: Gout is a risk factor for cardiovascular mortality due to its association with metabolic syndrome.

option_d.title: Gout is a risk factor for cardiovascular mortality due to its association with kidney disease.

correct_option.title: Gout is a risk factor for cardiovascular mortality due to its association with metabolic syndrome.
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
